name: Development-guide
tagline: This is a gh-pages website to document our development practices.
body:
### FDM development guide.

This development guide covers our development practices in general, and more specific items such as style guides for various languages.

### Programming and version control

This documents our approach to programming (TDD) and how we integrate with version control.

### Projects

We develop each project within it's own Vagrant machine which matches the production environment as close as possible.

### Development, staging and production environments

This is the different environments we use to develop our projects and how we move from one environment to the next.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
